ud8.8:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
ud8.8:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena visākhāya migāramātuyā nattā kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā.
ud8.8:3.4: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā allavatthā allakesā divā divassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud8.8:3.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud8.8:4.1: “Handa kuto nu tvaṃ, visākhe, āgacchasi allavatthā allakesā idhūpasaṅkantā divā divassā”ti?
ud8.8:4.3: Tenāhaṃ allavatthā allakesā idhūpasaṅkantā divā divassā”ti.
ud8.8:4.4: “Iccheyyāsi tvaṃ, visākhe, yāvatikā sāvatthiyā manussā tāvatike putte ca nattāro cā”ti?
ud8.8:4.5: “Iccheyyāhaṃ, bhagavā, yāvatikā sāvatthiyā manussā tāvatike putte ca nattāro cā”ti.
ud8.8:5.1: “Kīvabahukā pana, visākhe, sāvatthiyā manussā devasikaṃ kālaṃ karontī”ti?
ud8.8:5.2: “Dasapi, bhante, sāvatthiyā manussā devasikaṃ kālaṃ karonti;
ud8.8:5.10: dvepi, bhante, sāvatthiyā manussā devasikaṃ kālaṃ karonti.
ud8.8:5.11: Ekopi, bhante, sāvatthiyā manusso devasikaṃ kālaṃ karoti.
ud8.8:5.12: Avivittā, bhante, sāvatthi manussehi kālaṃ karontehī”ti.
ud8.8:6.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, visākhe, api nu tvaṃ kadāci karahaci anallavatthā vā bhaveyyāsi anallakesā vā”ti?
ud8.8:6.3: Alaṃ me, bhante, tāva bahukehi puttehi ca nattārehi cā”ti.
ud8.8:7.1: “Yesaṃ kho, visākhe, sataṃ piyāni, sataṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.2: yesaṃ navuti piyāni, navuti tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.3: yesaṃ asīti piyāni, asīti tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.4: yesaṃ sattati piyāni, sattati tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.5: yesaṃ saṭṭhi piyāni, saṭṭhi tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.6: yesaṃ paññāsaṃ piyāni, paññāsaṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.7: yesaṃ cattārīsaṃ piyāni, cattārīsaṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni, yesaṃ tiṃsaṃ piyāni, tiṃsaṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.8: yesaṃ vīsati piyāni, vīsati tesaṃ dukkhāni, yesaṃ dasa piyāni, dasa tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.9: yesaṃ nava piyāni, nava tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.10: yesaṃ aṭṭha piyāni, aṭṭha tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.11: yesaṃ satta piyāni, satta tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.12: yesaṃ cha piyāni, cha tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.13: yesaṃ pañca piyāni, pañca tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.14: yesaṃ cattāri piyāni, cattāri tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.15: yesaṃ tīṇi piyāni, tīṇi tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.16: yesaṃ dve piyāni, dve tesaṃ dukkhāni;
ud8.8:7.17: yesaṃ ekaṃ piyaṃ, ekaṃ tesaṃ dukkhaṃ;
ud8.8:7.18: yesaṃ natthi piyaṃ, natthi tesaṃ dukkhaṃ, asokā te virajā anupāyāsāti vadāmī”ti.
ud8.8:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
